name: Strawberry Daiquiri

ingredients.name: Aged Puerto Rican or Jamaican rum
Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)

preparation:
The Strawberry Daiquiri is a classic summertime drink. Chill down with this frosty rum concoction.

Add all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.

Pour into a Margarita glass or wine goblet.

Garnish with an edible orchid and a cocktail umbrella.
